taxon_name.authority: H. A. Crum & L. E. Anderson

bio:treatment.discussion: The type collection of Ditrichum rhynchostegium appears to have been lost, but comparison of material collected from the type locality with the original description left little doubt that it represented a distinct species, and that D. henryi is synonymous (H. Robinson 1966). Ditrichum rhynchostegium has been confused with D. pallidum but is readily distinguished from that species superficially and microscopically (see discussion under 7. D. pallidum). The report of D. rhynchostegium from the District or Columbia by R. R. Ireland (1982) is erroneous.
